description: Describes a schema. For more information on schemas, see CreateSchema.

parameters.name: schemaArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema to retrieve.

nested_items.name: schemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the schema was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the schema was last updated.

nested_items.name: domain
nested_items.description: The domain of a schema that you created for a dataset in a Domain dataset group.
